1000001.title: KONG® Classic Dog Toy - Treat Dispensing
1000001.shortdes: A durable, treat-dispensing toy designed to keep your dog engaged and mentally stimulated.
1000001.description: The KONG Classic is the gold standard of dog toys and has become the staple for dogs around the world for over forty years. Offering enrichment by helping satisfy dogs’ instinctual needs, the KONG Classic’s unique natural red rubber formula is ultra-durable with an erratic bounce that is ideal for dogs that like to chew while also fulfilling a dog’s need to play. Want to extend play time? Be sure to stuff with tempting bits of kibble and entice with a dash of peanut butter. Add to the fun by adding KONG Snacks and topping with KONG Easy Treat.
features: Mentally stimulating toy; offering enrichment by helping satisfy dogs’ instinctual needs
Unpredictable bounce for games of fetch
Recommended by veterinarians and trainers worldwide
Great for stuffing with KONG Easy Treat; Snacks or Ziggies
KONG classic red rubber formula for average chewers

1000002.title: KONG Goodie Bone
1000002.shortdes: The KONG Goodie Bone™ is a durable chew toy made from natural rubber, designed to engage dogs in long-lasting chew sessions while dispensing treats for added fun.
1000002.description: The KONG Goodie Bone™ toy engages dogs that delight in chew sessions. Made from the KONG Classic unique natural red rubber formula, this bone features the patented Goodie Grippers ™ that turn this entertaining toy into a fun treat dispensing challenge that can be stuffed with your dog’s favorite kibble. Want to extend the chew session? Stuff with KONG Snacks™ and entice with a bit of KONG Easy Treat™.
features: Durable natural KONG Rubber; bone shaped for chewing satisfaction
Two Goodie Grippers™ extend the mind-occupying challenge
Made in the USA. Globally Sourced Materials.
Patented Goodie Gripper™ holes are ideal for stuffing challenges

1000003.title: Lobster Plushie Dog Toy
1000003.shortdes: A fun, plush toy shaped like a lobster, great for cuddling and light play.
1000003.description: A fun, plush toy shaped like a lobster, great for cuddling and light play.
features: Perfect for small to medium dogs

1000004.title: Tim Hortons Plushie Dog Toy
1000004.shortdes: A cute plushie dog toy shaped like a Tim Hortons cup, perfect for playful pups.

2000001.shortdes: A feathered ball toy that stimulates your cat's natural hunting instincts.

2000002.title: Classic Cat Toy - Jingle Balls (3 Pack)
2000002.shortdes: A pack of three jingle balls that are perfect for chasing and batting.

2000003.title: Cat Plushie Cat Nip Toy
2000003.shortdes: A plush catnip-infused toy designed to attract and entertain your cat.

2000004.title: Flirt Pole Feather Cat Toy
2000004.shortdes: A flirt pole with feathers that encourages active play and exercise for your cat.

3000001.title: Bat Cave Small Pet Bed
3000001.shortdes: A cozy, bat-shaped pet bed designed for small pets like hamsters and guinea pigs.

3000002.shortdes: A cute pumpkin costume designed for small pets like rabbits and guinea pigs.
features: Adjustable straps for a comfortable fit

3000003.title: Mermaid Tail Character Hut
3000003.shortdes: A fun, mermaid-themed hut for small pets to hide and sleep in.
features: Great for small pets to rest

3000004.title: Wooden Circle Aquarium Ornament
3000004.shortdes: A wooden circle ornament designed for aquariums, perfect for fish to swim through.
features: Safe for freshwater and saltwater tanks
Adds an aesthetic touch to any aquarium
